context.p: All Linux servers must have a device entry in an organizer below the /Devices/Server/SSH/Linux device class.

note.p: The SSH monitoring feature will attempt to use key-based authentication before using a configuration properties password value.

li.p: Select Infrastructure from the navigation bar.
Click the device name in the device list.
Select Configuration Properties from the left panel.
Verify the credentials for the service account.

entry.p: Linux user with privileges to gather performance information.
